publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4315 Mr Frank McAveety: Congratulations to the Scotland Netball Team—That the Parliament offers congratulations to the Scotland netball team, which recently won two international games against Singapore at the Bellahouston Leisure Centre in Glasgow; commends the tremendous support given to the team by Culture and Sport Glasgow and Glasgow City Council in providing civic hospitality, which helped the team to move one place up the world league to 13th place in the International Federation of Netball Associations world rankings, and wishes the team luck in its forthcoming matches in Barbados.

S3M-4315 Mr Frank McAveety: Congratulations to the Scotland Netball Team—That the Parliament offers congratulations to the Scotland netball team, which recently won two international games against Singapore at the Bellahouston Leisure Centre in Glasgow; commends the tremendous support given to the team by Culture and Sport Glasgow and Glasgow City Council in providing civic hospitality, which helped the team to move one place up the world league to 13th place in the International Federation of Netball Association’s world rankings, and wishes the team luck in its forthcoming matches in Barbados. Supported by: Helen Eadie*, Sarah Boyack*, Karen Gillon*, John Park*, Kenneth Gibson*
S3M-4315 Congratulations to the Scotland Netball Team (lodged on 4 June 2009) Bob Doris*
S3M-4315 Congratulations to the Scotland Netball Team (lodged on 4 June 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Michael Matheson*, Jack McConnell*
S3M-4315 Congratulations to the Scotland Netball Team (lodged on 4 June 2009) Rhoda Grant*
S3M-4315 Congratulations to the Scotland Netball Team (lodged on 4 June 2009) Cathy Jamieson*
